Package mlp

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CharStream
    This interface describes a character stream that maintains line and column number positions of the characters.
    PomParserConstants
    Token literal values and constants.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Boundary  
    FeatureSet
    This class models a set of related features.
    LatexMacro
    This class models LaTeX macros, that is, new user-defined LateX commands that are specified using one of the following LaTeX commands: \newcommand, \renewcommand, and \providecommand.
    LatexUnicode
    A utility class for reading a file that has Unicodes and corresponding Latex commands/macros along with a brief description for each code, in a "raw" form, and returning a clean version of that.
    Lexicon
    Models a lexicon, where each entry is a (key,value) pair.
    LexiconFactory
    A factory class with static methods to create Lexicon objects from input files, write Lexicons into files, merge Lexicons, change the names of features and the names of feature-sets, and provides some other Lexicon related methods.
    LexiconUtility
    A utility class that has static methods for manipulating lexicons.
    MathTerm
    Models a mathematical term as a tagged term.
    MLP  
    MlpUtility
    This is a utility class that provides several static methods used in the mlp package.
    PomParser  
    PomParserTokenManager
    Token Manager.
    PomTaggedExpression
    This class models a POM-tagged math expression, which is a tree-like recursive structure, much like a parse tree, but it is not limited to being a parse tree in the conventional sense.
    Token
    Describes the input token stream.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ParseException
    This exception is thrown when parse errors are encountered.
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    TokenMgrError
    Token Manager Error.
